title: 3dThreetoRGB
description: Converts 3 sub-bricks of input to an RGB-valued dataset.

output_prefix.title: Output prefix
output_prefix.description: Write output into dataset with specified prefix

scale_factor.title: Scale factor
scale_factor.description: Multiply input values by this factor before using as RGB

mask_dataset.title: Mask dataset
mask_dataset.description: Only output nonzero values where the mask dataset is nonzero

fim.title: FIM flag
fim.description: Write result as a 'fim' type dataset (default behavior)

anat.title: Anatomical flag
anat.description: Write result as a anatomical type dataset

input_dataset.title: Input dataset
input_dataset.description: Input dataset or first dataset if three datasets are provided

input_dataset2.title: Second input dataset
input_dataset2.description: Second dataset, required only if three datasets are provided

input_dataset3.title: Third input dataset
input_dataset3.description: Third dataset, required only if three datasets are provided
